name: rpg-table-randomizer
description: Module for random tables for use in roleplaying games

scripts.browserify:min: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/index.js --s rpg_table_randomizer -o dist/rpg-table-randomizer.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -d -p [minifyify --map dist/rpg-table-randomizer.js.map --output dist/rpg-table-randomizer.js.map]
scripts.browserify:noname_min: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/index_noname.js --s rpg_table_randomizer -o dist/rpg-table-randomizer_noname.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -d -p [minifyify --map dist/rpg-table-randomizer_noname.js.map --output dist/rpg-table-randomizer_noname.js.map]
scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run browserify:min && npm run browserify:noname && npm run browserify:noname_min

author: Derik A Badman
